bio: I'm a full stack web developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I'm passionate about building impactful academic and community platforms like UniNexus and UIU Media.
Beyond web development, I'm exploring machine learning, number theory, and IoT projects. I've built several hardware projects including remote-controlled cars and firefighter robots.
My approach combines technical skills with creative problem-solving to deliver solutions that are both functional and user-friendly.
